alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Botetourt; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:57AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockbridge, northeastern Botetourt and northwestern Amherst Counties, the City of Buena Vista and the City of Lexington through 630 AM EDT... At 555 AM EDT, a cluster of strong thunderstorms were located near Interstate 81, between Fincastle and Lexington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington... Buena Vista... Buchanan... Glasgow... Forks Of Buffalo... Collierstown... and Rockbridge Baths. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or vehicle until the storms have passed. If traveling, watch out for locally heavy rain that will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
